title: Devil By The Tail, The, Le Diable Par La Queue 1969

sources.title: Devil By The Tail The Le Diable Par La Queue 1969 Yves Montand Madeleine Renaud
sources.description: Another comedy with a very gentle sense of humor. Three generations of women inn keepers are facing a hard time due to lack of customers. The youngest convinces her boyfriend at the gas station to start sabotaging cars and suddenly the rooms are full. Yves Montand plays delightfully over the top as a gangster and Marthe Keller spends quite of bit of time showing off her legs. Subtitles in English with French audio
